forum.content:
Dear choulihong,

We are looking for employees working remotely.

My name is Willie, I am the personnel manager of a large International company.
Most of the work you can do from home, that is, at a distance.
Salary is $2400-$5200.

If you are interested in this offer, please visitOur Site

Good day!
forum.title: 請益;誰能夠幫幫我翻譯
